REPLACE(REPLACE(advice,'<','<'),'>', '>')advice,
register_date, m_date, auth, id FROM emp LEFT OUTER JOIN member USING(mem_num) WHERE auth=2 ORDER BY register_date DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
